function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Challenges posed by the health crisis","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing strict health and safety measures, promoting hygiene practices, and ensuring rapid response to outbreaks","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, sanitation and disinfection technology, air filtration systems","People":"Employees, customers, general public","Owner":"Business owners, policymakers, health authorities"},{"Description":"Heightened focus on resilience","Impact":"Underestimating the risk of contagious diseases and neglecting health protocols","Mitigation":"Raising awareness about the importance of health and safety measures, integrating health considerations into resilience planning","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, temperature screening technology, remote work platforms","People":"Entrepreneurs, business leaders, policymakers","Owner":"Health authorities, business associations, government"},{"Description":"Desire for autonomy, wealth, power, status, and personal achievement in entrepreneurship","Impact":"Potential disregard for health and safety protocols in pursuit of personal gain","Mitigation":"Promoting ethical entrepreneurship, integrating health and safety training into business education and support programs","Technologies":"Virtual training platforms, online certification courses, business incubation programs","People":"Entrepreneurs, business owners, aspiring entrepreneurs","Owner":"Business associations, educational institutions, government"}]}
